UPDATE lecture_student A INNER JOIN lecture_applly B ON A.ilecture = B.ilecture SET A.finished_yn = 1, A.attendance = CASE WHEN #{attendance} > B.attendance THEN B.attendance ELSE #{attendance} END, A.midterm_examination = CASE WHEN #{midtermExamination} > B.midterm_examination THEN B.midterm_examination ELSE #{midtermExamination} END, A.final_examination = CASE WHEN #{finalExamination} > B.final_examination THEN B.final_examination ELSE #{finalExamination} END, A.total_score = CASE WHEN #{attendance} > B.attendance THEN B.attendance ELSE #{attendance} END + CASE WHEN #{midtermExamination} > B.midterm_examination THEN B.midterm_examination ELSE #{midtermExamination} END + CASE WHEN #{finalExamination} > B.final_examination THEN B.final_examination ELSE #{finalExamination} END,
A.update_at = NOW() WHERE A.ilecture_student = #{ilectureStudent} AND B.iprofessor = #{ipofessor} And B.ilecture = #{ilecture}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lecture_student A INNER JOIN student B ON A.istudent = B.istudent INNER JOIN major C ON B.imajor = C.imajor INNER JOIN lecture_applly D ON A.ilecture = D.ilecture;
